events.message: The policyholder reported a car collision that occurred yesterday evening at an intersection involving another vehicle.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident following the details of the vehicular collision provided by the claimant.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to handle the file and contact the claimant for further information.
The claimant has been notified that their claim has been received and acknowledged by our claims department.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including police report and vehicle damage photos.
Investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident has commenced, analyzing submitted evidence.
Investigation confirmed fault of the other driver, and damage extent has been fully assessed.
A settlement offer covering full repair costs and vehicle downtime reimbursement has been proposed to the claimant.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and prompt handling of the claim.
The insurance claim has been formally approved following acceptance of the settlement terms by the claimant.
Payment for the approved amount has been issued to the claimantâ€™s bank account as part of the settlement process.
The claim has been officially closed after disbursing payment and confirming no further actions required.
The completed and closed claim has been archived in the company system for future reference and audit purposes.
